contradiction_map.statement_b: BM25 introduced important improvements over classic TFâ€‘IDF: Feature\tBM25\tTFâ€‘IDF Term Frequency Scaling\tSaturation effect (controlled by kâ‚)\tLinear scaling (no saturation) Document Length Handling\tNormalized (parameter b) to avoid bias\tUnadjusted (long docs favored) Robustness\tHigh across diverse datasets (tunable)\tOften sensitive to corpus changes Interpretability\tTransparent, explainable scoring\tSimple formula (less refined control) Semantic Awareness\tNone (lexical only, no synonym support)\tNone (lexical only) Table: Key differences between BM25 and TFâ€‘IDF
